thread.title: AAA Names Best Western Partner of the Year for the Seventh Consecutive Time
thread.title_full: AAA Names Best Western Partner of the Year for the Seventh Consecutive Time - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: AAA Names Best Western Partner of the Year for the Seventh Consecutive Time
text:
Best Western’s Winning Streak Continues as it Hits Lucky Seven
PHOENIX, ARIZ (PRWEB) October 21, 2015
Best Western Hotels & Resorts has once again been named AAA Lodging Partner of the Year for 2015. This is the seventh year Best Western has been awarded this accolade, winning every year the honor has been awarded since 2008. This year Best Western was also named “Best in Club Travel Support” and “Best in Member Service.”
Every year, AAA , the nation’s largest full service leisure travel organization, asks stakeholders from across the U.S. and Canada vote on the awards. Year after year Best Western has risen to the top due to the company’s commitment to providing exceptional service and great value to AAA’s 55 million members in the U.S. and Canada.
“Best Western Hotels & Resorts and AAA have formed a powerful partnership that has brought tremendous benefits to their members, driving guests to our hotels,” said Best Western Senior Vice President of Marketing and Sales Dorothy Dowling. “Receiving this recognition for the seventh year in a row truly is an honor. Our brand is winning more awards than ever before, but this accolade is certainly one of the most valued by our brand.”
Through this partnership, AAA members can save up to 10 percent or more on room rates at Best Western hotels in the U.S., Canada and worldwide, every day. AAA members can also enjoy all the benefits of Best Western Rewards®, earn 10 points for every dollar spent on qualified hotel room rates, plus an additional 10 percent bonus points with each qualified hotel stay. Best Western Rewards points never expire and can be used for free nights, gift cards and more.
About Best Western Hotels & Resorts:
Best Western Hotels & Resorts headquartered in Phoenix, Ariz., is a privately held hotel brand with a global network of 4,100* hotels in more than 100* countries and territories worldwide. Best Western offers seven hotel brands to suit the needs of developers and guests in every market: BEST WESTERN®, BEST WESTERN PLUS®, BEST WESTERN PREMIER®, BEST WESTERN PLUS EXECUTIVE RESIDENCY®, Vb®, BW Premier Collection® and GL. Now celebrating 69 years of hospitality, Best Western provides its hoteliers with global operational, sales and marketing support, and online and mobile booking capabilities. More than 25 million travelers are members of the brand’s award-winning loyalty program Best Western Rewards®, one of the few programs in which members earn points that never expire and can be redeemed at any Best Western hotel worldwide. The brand’s partnerships with AAA/CAA, Minor League Baseball, and Harley-Davidson® provide travelers with exciting ways to interact with the brand. Best Western continues to set industry records and accolades, including Business Travel News naming BEST WESTERN and BEST WESTERN PLUS as the best mid-price and upper mid-price hotel chains, four consecutive Compuware Best of the Web gold awards for best hotel website and seven consecutive AAA/CAA Hotel Partner of the Year awards. More than half of all Best Western branded hotels have earned a TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence award.
*Numbers are approximate and may fluctuate.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13036608.htm
